name: Synthetic Cascadia subduction rupture thresholds
source: RepoPlan tectonic membrane vignette informed by Scholz (2019)
provenance: Synthetic sequence translating slow-slip stress accumulation ratios into rupture probabilities for UTF tectonic rehearsals.

variables.name: R
variables.description: Stress accumulation ratio (current shear stress / critical failure stress)

variables.name: response
variables.description: Probability that a slow-slip episode cascades into seismic rupture

impedance_context.interpretation: Hydration-eased membranes reduce impedance as rupture probability rises beyond Theta.
